channel.title: Enhanced Drafts Quick Capture (iPadOS/iOS)
channel.description:
Hello,
I’m new to Drafts and I’m trying to make it work better for me.
Maybe the community knows of a way to enhance the Safari shared action of “Drafts Quick Capture”.
It would be very useful if I could send a selected text in Safari to Drafts with a markdown appendix of `[name of website](url address)`.
Maybe there’s a shortcut somewhere?

item.title: Enhanced Drafts Quick Capture (iPadOS/iOS)
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
Sharing from Safari uses a web template, which you can configure in Settings. Discussed in the share extension article.

Note that the additional information is only available if you share via the toolbar share button in Safari. Sharing from the text selection directly only makes the text available.
